You've signed up for the Tectonic Starter Plan

It takes a few steps to get started:

1. Install Kubernetes.
2. Launch the Tectonic Console.
3. Sign up for https://quay.io to build and store your container images.

Get Started: https://tectonic.com/starter/docs/latest/

Join the CoreOS Community on IRC (#coreos) for questions, advice and camaraderie.
Issues can also be filed on GitHub (https://github.com/tectonicstack/tectonic-console-bugs/issues).

Download your license and manage your account at account.tectonic.com

If you didn't request this action, please let us know by responding to this email.

Have a good day!
